Deploy Code to a Virtual Machine
with AWS CodeDeploy

In this tutorial, I learn how to deploy application code to a virtual machine on AWS. I use AWS CodeDeploy, a service that automates code deployments to AWS or on-premises servers, to deploy code to virtual machines that you create and manage with Amazon EC2. 
Everything done in this tutorial is free tier eligible.


For more, information visit to the given link below.
